row.process:
:SET &SQLDRIVERCONNECT# = GET_VAR(VARA.UTIL.CONNECTIONS,&SYSTEM#,2) :IF &UTILITY# = "ucybdbcc" : SET &S_SQLDRIVERCONNECT# = &SQLDRIVERCONNECT# : SET &TARGET# = GET_PUBLISHED_VALUE(&$RESTART_RUNID#, T_SYSTEM#) : IF &TARGET# <> "" : SET &T_SQLDRIVERCONNECT# = GET_VAR(VARA.UTIL.CONNECTIONS,&TARGET#,2) : ELSE : SET &T_SQLDRIVERCONNECT# = &SQLDRIVERCONNECT# : ENDIF :ENDIF
:SET &LF# = UC_CRLF :SET &USE_JAVA# = "N" :SET &UTILDIR# = RESOLVE_VAR("{VARA.MAINTENANCE,DIR_UTIL}") :SET &OUTDIR# = RESOLVE_VAR("{UC_EX_PATH_JOBREPORT,&$AGENT#}") :SET &INIFILE# = "&OUTDIR#&UTILITY#_&$RESTART_RUNID#.ini" :SET &LOGFILE# = "&OUTDIR#&UTILITY#_&$RESTART_RUNID#.log" :SET &LCKFILE# = "&OUTDIR#&UTILITY#_&$RESTART_RUNID#.lck" :SET &TRCFILE# = "&OUTDIR#&UTILITY#_&$RESTART_RUNID#.trc.log" :SET &XMLFILE# = "&OUTDIR#definitions.&$RESTART_RUNID#.xml" :SET &EXT# = "" :SET &OUTFILE# = "&OUTDIR#definitions.&$RESTART_RUNID#.&EXT#" :SET &INI# = RESOLVE_VAR("{VARA.UTIL.INI,&UTILITY#,1}") :SET &HND# = CREATE_PROCESS(NEW) :SET &RET# = PUT_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,&INI#) :SET &RET# = WRITE_PROCESS(&HND#,"&INIFILE#",&$AGENT#,&$LOGIN#,OVERWRITE)
:PUBLISH &UTILITY#,,"TASK"
